svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#bbdefb, rgb(25, 55, 80)); stroke: light-dark(#1565c0, rgb(99, 168, 246));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 25px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
用户输入
创意想法 · 参考图片 · 参考视频

switch.text: 用户输入 — 创意想法 · 参考图片 · 参考视频

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#c8e6c9, rgb(28, 54, 29)); stroke: light-dark(#2e7d32, rgb(100, 168, 104));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 128px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 1-2：理解创意 & 深度挖掘
扫描 5 维度（主题 · 时长 · 风格 · 素材 · 声音）
缺失维度 → AskUserQuestion 动态选项补全（1-3 轮）
叙事结构始终讨论 · 优先级排序 · 剩余自动决策

switch.text: Phase 1-2：理解创意 & 深度挖掘

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ffe0b2, rgb(66, 39, 0)); stroke: light-dark(#e65100, rgb(251, 123, 53));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 252px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 3：素材制备 ★ 自适应
素材齐全 → 自动跳过 · 素材缺失 → AskUserQuestion 二选一
✅ 生成参考图（三视图 · 场景图 · 关键帧，并行生成）
⏭ 不需要，直接写提示词

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#e1bee7, rgb(86, 56, 92)); stroke: light-dark(#6a1b9a, rgb(237, 169, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 345px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.span: 质感取向前置判断（活人感 / 制作感）

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#ce93d8, rgb(132, 81, 141)); stroke: light-dark(#6a1b9a, rgb(237, 169, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 153px; height: 1px; padding-top: 402px; margin-left: 21px;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 153px; height: 1px; padding-top: 402px; margin-left: 371px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;

div.div:
31s+
独立生成 + 首帧衔接

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#fff3e0, rgb(36, 26, 9)); stroke: light-dark(#e65100, rgb(251, 123, 53));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 188px; height: 1px; padding-top: 485px; margin-left: 176px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#c5cae9, rgb(56, 61, 87)); stroke: light-dark(#283593, rgb(174, 185, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 560px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Phase 5：即梦提示词 + 操作指引
六板块结构：角色参考 → 背景 → 镜头 → 声音 → 风格 → 禁止项
AskUserQuestion 反馈迭代 → 满意后生成可视化 HTML

switch.text: Phase 5：即梦提示词 + 操作指引

rect.style: fill: light-dark(#d7ccc8, rgb(68, 58, 55)); stroke: light-dark(#4e342e, rgb(206, 184, 178));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 538px; height: 1px; padding-top: 655px; margin-left: 1px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
输出
可视化网页（自动打开）· 可复制提示词 · 操作指引

switch.text: 输出 — 可视化网页 · 可复制提示词 · 操作指引

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
